text: Hi how are you this day ?
Hey, I'm doing great, how are you?
I am very good. Glad to be doing this survey because it is for a good cause (Save the children) Do you agree ?
Oh absolutely! I think it's very important to donate to charities.

Yeah I stronlgly believe we should all pitch in and help. I am 100% sure I am going to donate 80%-100% of my earnings for this survey to (Save the children) It will make me feel good to help Little helpless children. What do you think you will be donating ?
I don't have the money right now to donate. I will defiantly be donating at the first of September though. I will try to donate at least five dollars.
We all need money, but this is a special cause and the money is not too much. These surveys are a good way for us to get involved and help those in need........Dont you agree ?
Oh yeah defiantly. Out of the earnings I earn from this survey I would probably donate at least half. It's only fair.
Wow that is so good to hear it reallly shows that most people are willing to help those who are less fortunate than ourselves.
Yeah it's very important to help someone that is less fortunate than yourself. Especially if they are children.
Did they tell you "How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment."
At this time I can't donate any amount. However I will donate later.

I thought you said you would donate a part of your earnings ? How about I match you on what you decide you can afford to donate. If you donate 30% I will donate 50% if you donate higher I will increase mine accordingly. It is a one time thing. Those kids suffer quite a lot and dont really have anyone to help them.
Sure I will donate 30%.
Awesome. I know I have never met you ,but I feel so good to be working with you to help someone even if it is such a small amount it makes me feel glad.
Same to you! Most people wouldn't give anything and it makes me really happy to meet someone that would help with whatever they can.
Yeah I agree 100% with you. I have been to other countries that are very poor and it is Amazing how much a little donation will make a BIG differance in these childrens lives.
I guess in America you don't really understand what other countries go through. That's awesome you have been to other countries. I don't mind helping at all.
I live in Florida. What part of USA are you from ?
North Carolina, I've been to Florida once, it's nice.
North Carolina is nice I have been there once. Well nice talking to you so I am going to Donate 70% and you will do the 30% .Good Deal and hope this will help others. Take care have a great day.
